generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved street with cars parked along both sides and a visible lane marking in the center, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: On the right side of the road, there is a paved area adjacent to the parked cars, separated by a curb, which is a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story residential and commercial buildings are visible along both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are present along the sidewalks and street, lining both sides of the road.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the street.
- car: Numerous cars are parked along both sides of the street.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign (P) is visible on the right side of the street.
- pole: Several poles, including traffic light poles and sign poles, are visible along the street.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible hanging over the street, near the center of the image.
